results.name: Number of prime divisors of A001222 (counted with multiplicity), with a(1) = 1 by convention.
comment: First 31 terms the same as A050370.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Index entries for sequences computed from exponents in factorization of n
formula: a(1) = 1; for n > 1, a(n) = A001222(A001222(n)).  - _Antti Karttunen_, Jul 28 2017
results.author: _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Nov 10 2009
